name: Philip W. Savrin
biography: Philip W. Savrin is a partner with the law firm of Freeman Mathis & Gary, LLP in Atlanta. After graduating with honors from Boston University School of Law, he served as a Staff Attorney for the Eleventh Circuit and then as a law clerk for the Honorable Harold L. Murphy of the Northern District of Georgia. Since entering private practice, Mr. Savrin has specialized in the areas of Section 1983 litigation and insurance coverage law. Mr. Savrin has published and spoken extensively in his practice areas.
